MemberSignature.Value: public void TunnelProxy (Org.Apache.Http.HttpHost next, bool secure, Org.Apache.Http.Params.IHttpParams params);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void TunnelProxy(class Org.Apache.Http.HttpHost next, bool secure, class Org.Apache.Http.Params.IHttpParams params) cil managed
abstract member TunnelProxy : Org.Apache.Http.HttpHost * bool * Org.Apache.Http.Params.IHttpParams -> unit

Docs.param: the proxy to which the tunnel was established. This is not the proxy through which the tunnel was established, but the new end point of the tunnel. The tunnel does not yet reach to the target, use to indicate an end-to-end tunnel.
true if the connection should be considered secure, false otherwise
the parameters for tunnelling this connection
Docs.summary: Indicates that a tunnel to an intermediate proxy has been established.
